install.packages("car")
library(car)
library(tidyverse)
glimpse(mtcars)

mtcars %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  group_by(am) %>%
  summarise(
    Means = mean(mpg)
  )

#Two_Sample_T tets#
two_sample_ttest <- t.test(mpg ~ am, data = mtcars, alternative = "two.sided", var.equal = T)
print(two_sample_ttest)

#One Way ANOVA#
anova_result <- aov(mpg ~ gear, data = mtcars)
summary(anova_result)
